pullRequest.title: [CDAP-17066] Integration test for RequestHistoryTab in HttpExecutor
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add integration test for the plugin JSON creator to test the following functionalities:

Render the request logs, sorted by timestamp
Add a request
Delete a request
Search for requests
Enable / disable save mode
Clear all requests

nodes.bodyText: Do we need to have localized text in the data-cy field?
Shouldn't this be MOCK_LOCAL_STORAGE (without the minus one) since the previous test added another request?
